attributes.action: Overturn the ban on hunting with dogs. Revoke the Hunting Act 2004.
attributes.additional_details: Our British identity includes horses, hunting dog breeds, communities and much loved public events that are quickly becoming obsolete. The Police have more pressing matters to deal with and would have more time to do so if they weren’t relentlessly pursuing British country folk.
attributes.background: Revoke the Hunting Act (2004) and protect traditional field sports. Allow permissive hunting with dogs in the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Repeal the Hunting Act 2004" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711568
